rootDir.description: If given, all the file paths in the collected type info will be resolved relative to this directory.

tsConfig.description: Path to your project's tsconfig file. This is required for several other options like implicit this instrumentation and type inference using static analysis.

instrumentCallExpressions.description: Try to find even more types by combining static analysis with the runtime analysis. TypeWiz will try to use TypeScript's inferred types when determining the type of a function argument.

instrumentImplicitThis.description: Find type of this in non-class member functions. Requires common.tsConfig to be set

skipTwizDeclarations.description: Don't add a declaration of $_$twiz to instrumented files.

prefix.description: A prefix that will be added in front of each type applied. You can use a javascript comment to mark the automatically added types. The prefix will be added after the colon character, just before the actual type.
